metadata.title: Acoustic Audio by Goldwood Bluetooth 5.1 Surround Sound System with LED Light Display, FM Tuner, USB and SD Card Inputs - 6-Piece Home Theater Speaker Set, Includes Remote Control - AA5400 Black
features: THE ULTIMATE HOME THEATER EXPERIENCE: Our 5.1 speaker system includes 5 speakers and 1 subwoofer; Delivers powerful surround sound while watching TV, gaming, or streaming music from your phone to the built in Bluetooth receiver

LED ILLUMINATED SURROUND SOUND: Each system features an integrated power amp with 300 watts of power while the LED illuminated subs display multi colored flashing lights in a variety of different patterns

GREAT FOR AT HOME ENTERTAINMENT: Use our sound equipment for binge-watching your favorite TV shows, for movie nights at home with the family, or for gaming on your computer, or for listening to music on your MP3 player
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Our system is compatible with any standard 3.5 millimeter headphones, RCA stereo, or RCA 6 Channel surround audio outputs, and features a standard US 110V grounded wall plug

WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Acoustic Audio by Goldwood AA5400 powered subwoofer speaker, 5 passive wired satellite speakers, full function remote, 3.5 millimeter to RCA cable, 3 RCA to RCA jack cables, and an instruction manual
description: Enjoy crystal clear surround sound in the comfort of your own home.Our compact and portable Bluetooth powered sound system comes with all of the equipment and accessories you need for an unforgettable surround sound experience anywhere in your house, from your living room, family room, bedroom, or home office. Use our sound equipment for TV or home entertainment, computer or PC, DVD or MP3 player, or for gaming.5 wired satellite speakers that measure 7 x 4.5 x 4 inches each.1 powered subwoofer speaker that measures 11.75 x 7.5 x 10.5 inches.6 independent RCA inputs for true surround sound, Stereo RCA AUX inputs, Front panel controls, USB drive input, SD card input, Full function wireless remote control, Magnetically shielded raw wire satellite speakers, 30Hz-20 kHz frequency response,Enhanced bass boost,Ported design, Hang notches on the back of each satellite speaker for easy hanging and mounting, 2 front and 1 center satellite speakers have 7.5 foot of raw wire cables, 2 rear speakers have 25.5 foot raw wire cables.Unbeatable sound equipment made by the experts.Since 1991, Goldwood has manufactured professional grade audio and electronic products that are known throughout the industry for their superior sound and reliability. We are passionate about delivering the top quality products you deserve at unbeatable values and affordable prices.
